languages.text: "Иногда по вентиляции до нас доносятся молебны. В такие моменты прям чувствуешь — Император с нами".

traits.locale_text: "Иногда по вентиляции до нас доносятся молебны. В такие моменты прям чувствуешь – Император с нами".

languages.text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."
languages.original_text: "Иногда по вентиляции до нас доносятся молебны. В такие моменты прям чувствуешь — Император с нами".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. At such moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."
"Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. At such moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."
"Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."
"Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

languages.text: 「時々、換気口を通して祈りの声が聞こえてくる。そんな時には、本当に皇帝がそばにおいでくださってるように思えるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

traits.locale_text: 「時々、換気口を通して祈りの声が聞こえてくる。そんな時には、本当に皇帝がそばにおいでくださってるように思えるんだ」

languages.text: « Parfois, on entend des prières par les canalisations, et c'est dans ces moments-là que l'on sent vraiment que l'Empereur est avec nous. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

traits.locale_text: « Parfois, on entend des prières par les canalisations, et là, on sent vraiment que l'Empereur est avec nous. »

languages.text: “有的时候，那些祈祷会通过通风口传到我们这里。那种时候，你就会真切地感觉到帝皇与我们同在。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，那些祈祷会通过通风口传到我们这里。那种时候，你就会真切地感觉到帝皇与我们同在。”

languages.text: "Manchmal erreichen uns Gebete durch das Lüftungssystem. In solchen Momenten spüren wir deutlich, dass der Imperator bei uns ist."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal erreichen uns Gebete durch das Lüftungssystem. In solchen Momenten spüren wir deutlich, dass der Imperator bei uns ist."

languages.text: «A veces escuchamos los rezos por el conducto de ventilación. Es entonces cuando sentimos que el Emperador no nos ha abandonado».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

traits.locale_text: «A veces escuchamos los rezos por el conducto de ventilación y sentimos que el Emperador no nos ha abandonado».

languages.text: "Bazen havalandırmadan dualar duyuyoruz. O anlarda İmparator'un varlığını içimizde hissediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes prayers reach us through the ventilation. In those moments, you really feel that the Emperor is with us."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen havalandırmadan dualar duyuyoruz. O anlarda İmparator'un varlığını içimizde hissediyoruz."
